summary: Both REQ-1 (PDF Download Button) and REQ-2 (Gemini-powered Explore More section) are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is addressed via a new pdfGenerator.ts utility and a Download PDF button in ItineraryTimeline.tsx. REQ-2 is addressed via a new geminiClient.ts utility and ExploreMoreSection.tsx component, integrated into PlanTrip.tsx. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: A 'Refresh' button is added to the Explore More section allowing users to re-trigger the Gemini API call on demand.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a refresh/retry button for the Explore More section. This is an additional UI feature not specified in REQ-2.
